lead_paragraph: We learn that the Messrs. parsons, the celebrated Nursery men, at Flushing L. I., have recently made the magnificent offer to give to the village ten acres of land, pleasantly located, for a Public Park, on condition that the village will enclose it with a suitable fence, and raise a fund sufficient to keep it in repair.
